title: Articles showing truncated content in Research View (production vs local)

description.title: Articles showing truncated content in Research View (production vs local)
description.description: ISSUE: Articles in Research View show short/truncated content in production but full content locally. ROOT CAUSE: When API results are transformed to Article objects, the content field was set to result.chunk.excerpt (which is a short excerpt). The curated fallback data has fullContent fields with complete articles. Locally, the API often fails so fallback curated data with fullContent is used. In production, the API succeeds and returns only excerpts. FIX: Added transformSearchResult() function and buildCuratedContentMap() to enrich API results with curated fullContent when the chunk_id matches. FILES MODIFIED: src/pages/student/ResearchWorkspace.tsx
description.close_reason: Fixed by enriching API results with curated fullContent data
